A CONTEMPORARY LEADER: JOHN ELKANN

Leadership is the process whereby a person establishes significant impacts over others while infusing them with inspiration, motivation, and directing individual actions in order to achieve the organisational objectives of an organization (Gareth R. Jones, 2019). Noting the compelling nature of this evidence, it is shown that leadership is crucial in today’s society as it has definite advantages. Thus, I would like to highlight several main topics related to leadership : leadership traits and skills, behavior and power.

Biography of John Elkann

It is known that Ferrari's 60-year heritage of exceptional success in racing, most notably in Formula 1, has contributed significantly to the mystique of motorsport racing. Along with another sign of dominance, Exor N., the world’s top 2000 largest publicly traded corporations, which, is also regarded as one of the world's largest corporations in terms of revenue [CITATION For21 \l 17417 ]. Thus, have you ever wondered who has maintained the magnificence of these prominent companies?

John Philip Jacob Elkann or known as John Elkann is a mainstay of these companies’ growth. In point of fact, Elkann is the chairman of Stellantis and Ferrari, two automotive companies. It is worth noting that he also serves on the board of Exor, the holding firm that has a part in both car companies. Emphasizing his early life, he was born in New York City in 1976 and has traveled extensively and lived in many countries, including Brazil, France, and Italy. He was also able to become bilingual in four languages as a result of this. Furthermore, Elkann’s educational journey has benefited him in an array of ways. He had successfully attained a scientific baccalaureate from the Lycée Victor Duruy in Paris and a degree in engineering from Politecnico, University of Turin, along with a number of apprenticeships. As a result, Elkan was able to observe the industrial, marketing, and sales parts of the organization. It is certain that Elkann is destined for greatness, his all-around excellence has been proven until today.

Leadership Traits & Skills

Dominance

It is irrefutable that Elkann’s leadership experiences have made him one of the world’s most prestigious leaders. John Elkann may not be a household name, but John Elkann has been linked with some well-known firms, like Exor, Fiat and Ferrari. In spite of being descended from a growing list of Fiat executives, Elkann has distinguished himself as a dominant executive who has the ability to control an organization [CITATION Jul21 \l 17417 ]. To exemplify, stating Ferrari’s objectives to the public ensures that their employees and supporters are able to view the broad picture of its objectives. According to Barry (2021), Elkann stated that Ferrari would concentrate on electrification of powertrains over the next decade, as a result of industry-wide tighter pollution requirements. Thus, it is proven that Elkann is a dominant leader as he goes above and beyond to describe Ferrari’s strategies and action plans to attain its goals.

Intelligence

Additionally, John Elkann has great conceptual skills as he is able to comprehend the problems and find strategies to overcome them. During the Ferrari conference call, Elkann noted that Ferrari has posted a 206 million euro profit on Monday, reversing a year-on-year decline due to the pandemic[CITATION Col21 \l 17417 ]. In spite of the challenge, he managed to increase the record month for Ferrari orders: the number of women putting reservations has doubled although the average age of new Ferrari owners is decreasing. He also stated that this testifies to Ferrari's distinctive and lasting power due to the capability of solving the solutions for future demands. Ergo, it is shown that he possesses excellent conceptual abilities , as seen by his ability to recognize challenges and devise ways for overcoming them.
